notification.AddLegacy.description:
NOTIFICATION [Client/Menu] Adds a standard notification to your screen.

[string] Text
  The string to display

[number] Type
  Determines the method for displaying the notification. See the NOTIFY_ Enums

[number] Length
  The number of seconds to display the notification for

notification.AddProgress.description:
NOTIFICATION [Client/Menu] Adds a notification with an animated progress bar.

[any] id
  Can be any type. It's used as an index.

[string] strText
  The text to show

notification.Kill.description:
NOTIFICATION [Client/Menu] 

[any] uid
  The unique ID of the notification
